price: 1. Tout ce qui est dans les cieux et sur terre rend gloire à Allah. À Lui la royauté ! À Lui toute louange ! Il est de Toute chose Infiniment Capable.
arabic: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ لَهُ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ وَلَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yusabbiḥu lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi lahu al-mul'ku walahu al-ḥamdu wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
